description:
Police captain of special department.
A silent girl with long black hair, black eyes, and a black cape. Although at first it seems she`s the Spirit, Matia is actually the Dantist, and a good one.
Her instrument is a blues harp. Although not as complicated as a One-Man Orchestra, it is similar to the instruments of the past which require higher technique to play Commandia with.
name: Matia Machiya
